headline: Built for Privacy & Speed
description: Everything you need to share content securely across devices without compromising your privacy

features.title: End-to-End Encrypted
features.description: Your content is encrypted on your device before upload. We never see your data.

features.title: Auto-Expiring Drops
features.description: Set expiration times or one-time access. Content disappears automatically.

features.title: Cross-Device Sync
features.description: Seamlessly move content between your phone, tablet, and computer.

features.title: Lightning Fast
features.description: Share instantly without waiting. No upload limits, no compression.

features.title: Developer Friendly
features.description: Share code snippets with syntax highlighting and formatting preserved.

features.title: No Account Required
features.description: Start sharing immediately. No sign-ups, no tracking, no hassle.
